"Add Users with the options below" "Add Boards and Classes" "No Board and Class information yet" "No Accounts Yet"
Each account needs to be associated with at least 1 Board-Class. \nTo add a Board/Class click on "+" above. You can add as many Boards and Classes as you are associated with. \nIt is important to have the right set of Boards and Classes so that you can create, share and study lessons in the corresponding syllabus. \nYou can later add and delete Boards and Classes whenever you need to. "Accounts registered with this device will appear here. Multiple Accounts can use the same device. To add an Account, choose from the options below:"
Share Edit Remove Delete Add Syllabus Share Edit Remove Lesson Delete Add Syllabus Post to Students with this Syllabus Options Save Offline Upload Offline Report Spam Post to Public Post to connections Follow Delete Lesson Delete All Shares Delete My Shares Unpost from Public Extend Post to Public Extend Post to Followers Unpost from connections Post to Followers and Connections Unpost from followers Include in Online Received Tab View Creator Profile View Sharer Profile

Share Lesson Tap and hold at any level to select \neverybody within
Having an Account Id helps because: You can then let others send connection requests to your Account Id without disclosing your phone number. \nUsing your Account Id and Password, you can add your existing account to another device, giving you flexibility to use LessonPot from multiple devices. You can register additional phone numbers from which you can access your LessonPot account by inputting them here. Use the + button at the top to add a new number. Note that once a phone number is registered, you will need to access LessonPot on that phone to remove yourself if needed. Phone Numbers: Registered Board(s)/Class(es) can only have their school information modified. To delete a Board/Class, go to the All Lessons Screen. Account Id updated successfully
Remove Account will be removed from this phone. In case you want to add the Account back later, you will need an Account Id which is to be configured through the "My Account" screen. Do you want to proceed?
Delete Board/Class Once you delete this Board/Class, all Subjects and all lessons that have been created or received within it will be removed.
Delete Subject Once you delete this Subject, all lessons that have been created or received within it will be removed.
Hold and drag to change order Filter Lessons Apply Remove Filter Edit Filter Request Support Send Feedback Syllabus Help
How to get my Syllabus Right! Syllabus consists of your Boards-Classes and the Subjects in each Board-Class.\n\n You can add Boards and Classes from the ""My Account"" screen, and can delete them from the ""All Lessons"" screen.\n\n To get the right subjects and the right version of those subjects, you can do one of the following:\n\n 1. Add Syllabus from a Lesson received\n\n 2. Add Syllabus from a Connection\n\n 3. Add Syllabus from the Syllabus Wizard\n\n 4. Click the Syllabus Help button below to reach us for assistance" I need Syllabus Help! Ways To Get Syllabus Right
is available for LessonPot. Please update the app to continue using it. Update Highlights: Delete Connection All lessons shared between you and this connection will be permanently removed!

Edit Location Syllabus change will make this a freshly created lesson not shared with anybody. Post/share again if you want. \nDo you want to proceed? You, along with everyone, will completely lose this lesson online. \nDo you want to proceed? The offline version on this phone will be deleted. \nDo you want to proceed? Only you will now have access to this lesson online. \nDo you want to proceed? This removes all past shares and posts done by you of this lesson. \nDo you want to proceed? This lesson cannot be shared by others anymore. This lesson cannot be saved offline by others anymore. Lesson will no longer be visible to Public.\nIt also cannot be shared by others anymore. All lessons shared by this user with you will be permanently removed! \nDo you want to proceed?
